General.Name: Metropolitan Land Tbk
General.Description: PT Metropolitan Land Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of residential and commercial properties in Indonesia. It operates through Real Estate, Shopping Center, Hotel, and Others segments. The company is also involved in the land acquisition; real estate development and leasing; hotel construction and operation; and sale of land and building properties, including residential houses, shop houses, and apartments. In addition, it owns and operates shopping centers, recreation centers, and sports centers. PT Metropolitan Land Tbk was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia.
General.Address: M-Gold Tower Office Wing, Bekasi, Indonesia, 17148
